alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 3:37AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Union County, western Union, eastern Claiborne and northern Lincoln Parishes through 415 AM CDT... At 337 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Junction City to 8 miles northwest of Grambling. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Farmerville, Bernice, Strong, Urbana, Lawson, Cooley, Dubach, Simsboro, Vienna, Lisbon, Spearsville, Lillie, D Arbonne, New London, Mount Zion, Oakland, Corinth, Unionville and Aurelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
